original_text: It would have been better if I had died at birth. I should have been born dead. It would have been better if I had died at birth.
korean_text: 어찌하여 내가 태에서 죽어 나오지 아니하였던가 어찌하여 내 어머니가 해산할 때에 내가 숨지지 아니하였던가

sentences.original_text: It would have been better if I had died at birth.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 태어날 때 죽었더라면 더 좋았을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I should have been born dead.
It would have been better if I had died at birth.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 태어날 때 죽었더라면 더 좋았을 것이다.
